messages.install:
First alpha release of Beyond Reality Farscapes 3.0.0-a1

Farscapes is the next generation of our Beyond Reality mod-pack for Minecraft Forge 1.11.2.

Note that this is currently at an early alpha stage. Be prepared for some world incompatible changes, frequent mod updates, additions or removal.

There is currently no balancing effort yet.

Please consult this changes log or our github commit history for more info.
messages.update:
Yet another update to Beyond Reality Farscapes

Mod-pack is still at an early alpha stage.

Be prepared to deal with possible world breaking changes.

Please consult this changelog or our github commit history for more info.

warnings.warning:
!!! EARLY ALPHA !!!

Be prepared to deal with possible world breaking changes!

mod.name: Minecraft Forge
mod.description: Minecraft Forge is a modding API used by alot of mods.

mod.name: AutoRegLib
mod.description: Automatically item, block, and model registration for mods.

mod.name: BD Lib
mod.description: A library of generic code for my other mods

mod.name: Chameleon
mod.description: Shared code and render support for mods. Used by jaquadro's mods.

mod.name: compatlayer
mod.description: Compatibility layer to make migrating between different vanilla/forge versions easier

mod.name: EXCore
mod.description: Elix'x Core

mod.name: Farseek
mod.description: A Scala API for Minecraft mods.

mod.name: Foamfix
mod.description: FoamFix is a mod which makes Minecraft go fast - by which I mean use less memory.

mod.name: LLibrary
mod.description: The lightweight Minecraft modding library

mod.name: MalisisCore
mod.description: MalisisCore is a framework dedicated to simplify many processes required during a mod development.

mod.name: MattDahEpic Core
mod.description: Base Mod for all MattDahEpic mods.

mod.name: RebornCore
mod.description: RebornCore, A core set of classes.

mod.name: ShadowMC
mod.description: A library mod required for all my other mods.

mod.name: Shadowfacts-Forgelin
mod.description: My fork of Emberwalker's Forgelin, with some sprinkles on top.

mod.name: ShetiPhian-Core
mod.description: Core set of files needed by ShetiPhians mods

mod.name: Stellar API
mod.description: API for mods related with sky and celestial sphere.

mod.name: TESLA
mod.description: A modern power API

mod.name: ThutCore
mod.description: API used by Thut's Mods

mod.name: Zero CORE
mod.description: Utility mod and multiblock API

mod.name: BiomeTweaker
mod.description: Used to tweak various characteristics of biomes.

mod.name: Unified Items
mod.description: Unified Items is a mod to centralize ore generation and items into one simple to use package. It is entirely modular by design and therefore only loads the necessary modules on runtime.

mod.name: Resource Loader
mod.description: Allows mod pack creators / users to add their own custom textures to minecrafts resources without making a resource pack.

mod.name: Custom Main Menu
mod.description: Allows you to edit the mainmenu using json

mod.name: Default Options
mod.description: A way for modpacks to ship a default (key) configuration without having to include an options.txt file.

mod.name: NetherPortalFix
mod.description: Ensures correct destinations when travelling back and forth through Nether Portals in Multiplayer.

mod.name: Fullscreen Windowed
mod.description: Activates fullscreen windowed mode for Minecraft

mod.name: Sound Filters
mod.description: Adds reveb to caves, as well as muted sounds underwater/in lava, and behind walls.

mod.name: Dynamic Surroundings
mod.description: Improving Minecraft's sight and sound experience

mod.name: Light Level Overlay Reloaded
mod.description: A mod visualizes the light level on top of blocks.

mod.name: Stellar Sky
mod.description: Constellations & Planets in Minecraft! You can see Real Sky with this mod.

mod.name: Teslafied
mod.description: Allows RF capable Tile Entities to also support Tesla

mod.name: Bloodmoon
mod.description: Adds the bloodmoon from terraria to minecraft

mod.name: Fast Leave Decay
mod.description: Makes leave decay faster

mod.name: HelpFixer
mod.description: Fixes the help command from mod derpyness

mod.name: Morpheus
mod.description: Morpheus is a server-only mod that adds sleep voting to a forge based server. When a player sleeps, all other players in the same dimension are notified so it is easier to coordinate.

mod.name: NBTEdit
mod.description: In-game NBT editing for Entities and TileEntities

mod.name: World Stripper
mod.description: Strip The World! #AllNude

mod.name: WorldEdit
mod.description: WorldEdit is an easy-to-use in-game world editor for Minecraft, supporting both single player and multiplayer.

mod.name: WorldEdit CUI Forge Edition
mod.description: WorldEdit CUI is a client-side user interface for WorldEdit.

mod.name: Placeable Items Mod
mod.description: This mod allows players to place items as 3D models

mod.name: ReAuth
mod.description: A Mod to renew your Session

mod.name: Villager Fix
mod.description: Tweak for villagers and mobGriefing in 1.8

mod.name: Actually Additions
mod.description: Do you want Automation? Wireless Transport? Better Machines? A cup o' Coffee? Chests? Better Hoppers? Leaf Blowers? Faster Growth? Plants? Well, Actually Additions has all that and a lot more!

mod.name: Better Builder's Wands
mod.description: Wands that allow placing of multiple blocks at a time

mod.name: Reliquary
mod.description: Two words: magical swag. Oh, and a gun.

mod.name: Not Enough Wands
mod.description: Wands, wands, and more wands

mod.name: Platforms
mod.description: This mod adds platforms with a range of customization. You can make decks, bridges, mine shafts, or even wooden coaster supports.

mod.name: Advanced Generators
mod.description: Freeform Multiblock generators that produce MJ, RF and EU

mod.name: Morph-o-Tool
mod.description: The wrench to end all wrenches.

mod.name: Super Crafting Frame
mod.description: An item frame that can craft items when punched.

mod.name: Embers
mod.description: Dwarven-style Magitech Mod

mod.name: Modular Routers
mod.description: Item routers with pluggable modules to define behaviour

mod.name: Spartan Shields
mod.description: Spartan Shields adds a variety of new shields to Minecraft.

mod.name: Inventory Tweaks
mod.description: Tweaks to inventory handling for ease of use, including sorting and automatic replacement of broken tools or exhausted stacks of items.

mod.name: TorchMaster
mod.description: Adds a special torch which prevents mobs from spawning in a configurable range

mod.name: Thut Permissions
mod.description: Permissions mod for Forge

mod.name: Thut Essentials
mod.description: Essentials mod for Forge

mod.name: TrashSlot
mod.description: Adds a trash slot to the inventory screen that allows deletion of unwanted items.

mod.name: Better Fonts
mod.description: OpenType font support for Minecraft

mod.name: Better Foliage
mod.description: Better Foliage is a Forge mod that will make your Minecraft worlds more impressive, mainly by improving how vegetation looks. It is fully compatible with other visual enhancement mods (Optifine, Shaders Mod, Colored Lights Core).

mod.name: Mouse Tweaks
mod.description: A mod that enhances the inventory management by adding various additional functions to the usual mouse buttons.

mod.name: MoreOverlays
mod.description: Adds some overlays from NEI (Mob spawns, Chunk Bounds, Item Search)

mod.name: Placement Preview
mod.description: Shows a preview of the block that will be placed

mod.name: Just Enough Items
mod.description: Simple recipe and item helper.

mod.name: JEI Bees
mod.description: Adds JEI recipes that show breeding and products from Forestry bees, trees and butterflies.

mod.name: Just Enough Resources
mod.description: Adds Resources and Mob Drops to JEI

mod.name: JourneyMap
mod.description: JourneyMap Unlimited Edition: Real-time map in-game or in a web browser as you explore.

mod.name: AppleSkin
mod.description: Adds various food-related HUD improvements

mod.name: Waila
mod.description: Hwyla (Here's What You're Looking At) is a UI improvement mod aimed at providing block information directly in-game. It is al...

mod.name: Waila Harvestability
mod.description: An add-on for Waila that adds information about the harvestability of what you are looking at

mod.name: What's That Slot
mod.description: What's That Slot (WTS) allows you to check what items can be put into hovered slot with a single press of a key!

mod.name: Baubles
mod.description: Adding a touch of bling to Minecraft

mod.name: Iron Chest
mod.description: New chests with larger sizes, with in-place upgrade items. The feature chest is the crystal chest, which is transparent - some inventory contents are visible without opening the chest

mod.name: Packing Tape
mod.description: Adds a simple means to carry thigns with you

mod.name: Literal Ascension
mod.description: Adds intuitive solutions for vertical mobility.

mod.name: Clipboard
mod.description: A simple clipboard for keeping track of your todo list.

mod.name: Quark
mod.description: Small things.

mod.name: Forestry
mod.description: Trees, bees and more.

mod.name: GenDustry
mod.description: Adds industrial apiaries, advanced genetic manipulation and mutation (Forestry addon)

mod.name: Storage Drawers
mod.description: Multi-drawer storage blocks for quick storage and retrieval.

mod.name: Extra Utilities
mod.description: Just a bunch of useful things

mod.name: Pam's HarvestCraft
mod.description: Expanding minecraft's food system.

mod.name: Random Things
mod.description: Random Things packed into one Mod.

mod.name: Extreme Reactors
mod.description: Adds large, multiblock power generation machines to Minecraft. Compatible with Redstone Flux (RF) and Tesla power. This is a port of the 1.7.10 mod Big Reactors from ErogenousBeef

mod.name: TechReborn
mod.description: TechReborn, The Gregtech revival you dream about on a cool mid summer's eve.

mod.name: Pressure Pipes
mod.description: Unlimited Fluid Transport

mod.name: Waystones
mod.description: Teleport back to activated waystones. For Survival, Adventure or Servers.

mod.name: Refined Storage
mod.description: An elegant solution to your hoarding problem

mod.name: Sophisticated Wolves
mod.description: Improves wolves through gameplay tweaks, AI improvements, and new features.

mod.name: Tool Belt
mod.description: Adds a (baubles-aware) belt that you can use to hold multiple tools at once.

mod.name: Wolf Armor and Storage
mod.description: Adds armors and storage for wolves!

mod.name: Village Names
mod.description: Generates random names for villages and villagers.

mod.name: Custom Ore Generation
mod.description: Allows the player to customize how ore is generated.

mod.name: Default World Generator
mod.description: A small mod to automatically select the default world generator for both single player and servers

mod.name: Realistic Terrain Generation
mod.description: Adds a new world type which generates realistic terrain for Overworld biomes.

mod.name: Streams
mod.description: This mod introduces real flowing rivers, with a true current, to your Minecraft worlds. Compatible with many terrain generators.

mod.name: Roguelike Dungeons
mod.description: Adds randomized dungeons to the world

mod.name: Chisels & Bits
mod.description: a mod about Sculpting, Decorating and Aesthetics

mod.name: Extra Bit Manipulation
mod.description: Adds extra in-world bit manipulation to the Chisels & Bits mod.

mod.name: MalisisDoors
mod.description: Better doors!

mod.name: MalisisSwitches
mod.description: Wireless Switches for Minecraft

mod.name: MrCrayfish's Furniture Mod
mod.description: Adds over 50 unique pieces of furniture to the game!

mod.name: Missing Pieces
mod.description: Some blocks I wanted in the game.
